QuestData.Title: The Curse of Fletcher's Hollow
QuestData.Description:
It's obvious the constable won't be swayed until we discover what happened at Fletcher's Hollow. I know very little myself--only that the village has been overrun by monstrous creatures.
I must ask that you travel there in my stead and try to uncover what befell the village. I'm sure Marshal Reade will prevent the constable from harming me while you're away.
Do this for me, and I will help you as I can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Evelyn Pare at the Timbered Strand in Drustvar.
QuestData.RewardText: You're looking to help solve this curse? Well, that's good to hear. We can surely use all the help we can get.$B$BI'm happy to help you get to the bottom of this. First things first, though, we need to save some of our villagers.$B$BCare to lend a hand?
